  • Effects & Filters: Enhance footage with cinematic filters, glitch effects, blur backgrounds, and over 60 transition styles for a polished finish.
  • Audio & Music: Import music and sound effects, record voice-overs, extract audio from video, and use built-in fade options for seamless sound design.
  • Text, Stickers & Emoji: Customize videos with animated text, trending fonts, stickers, and emoji—perfect for social media planning.
  • Photo Editor & Collage: Create stylish photo collages, remove backgrounds, apply filters, and adjust HSL (hue, saturation, luminance) for captivating images.
  • AI Tools: Auto-captions, body effects, background removal, and smart tracking make polishing faster, easier, and smarter.
  • Export & Share: Save videos in HD or 4K 60fps quality and instantly share to TikTok, Instagram, YouTube, WhatsApp, Facebook and more.

Note: InShot offers free editing tools with optional in‑app purchases and subscriptions for premium filters and watermark removal.

Download InShot today and transform your photos and videos into professional-grade creations—right from your phone!
